issue.title: Implement PublicMembers (of Org) API

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: Fixes #1091 by implementing access to the public [members of an organization API](https://developer.github.com/v3/orgs/members/).

body: @yegor256 please pay attention to this issue
@longtimeago thanks a lot for reporting, **15 mins** added to your acc, pmt ID `59894906`

Job [#1110](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1110) is now in scope, role is `DEV`

issue.title: For #1110: Use MkContainers into try-with-resource blocks.

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
For #1110:
- Added try-with-resource blocks to close MkContainers after usage, preventing resource leaks
- Replaced try-catch approach in some classes as it was not safe enough (some methods wasn't being covered)
- Left puzzle to continue this issue
